In the center of alliance island, the Massive Infecicon warship, The 
Oblivion hovers over the last pile of equipment from the Iron fist 
and the other alliance base. In a moment a beam flys down as eight 
black rings surround the load and then transport it up and into the 
ships cargo hold. Inside the ship the mysterious infecticon watches 
over a display on the arm rest of his command chair and then looks to 
Diablo and Demonite.

????: "It is done?"

Demonite: "Yes my lord. All equipment has been retrieved and 
transported."

????: "How about the crew?"

As the mysterious infecticons says this the pale blue female robogt 
known as Frostbite steps forward.

Frostbite: "The ships crew has been transported to the stasis hold. 
THe unknown is currently awaiting in the medical bay awaiting to be 
awakened."

????: "Very well. I shall go speak with this being as well as 
Blacknightmare. Have this ship go back into the ocean where it once 
was. Once we are clear of the island... Order Lucenite to destroy it 
with the Fury cannon. After this we shall assault Maximal City."

Frostbite: "At once."

The mysterious infecticon then stands and turns around before he 
leaves the presence of the others. Frostbite then sits in the command 
chair. A moment later the ship heads back towards its previous 
resting place in the ocean. Meanwhile, once again the three support 
cannons of the Fury cannon glow and prepare to fire as deep in the 
ocean at the main infecticon Complex Lucenite cackles as it presses 
various buttons. A secodn later the ocean lights up withj an intense 
light as the fury cannon itself begins to glow as an intense field of 
energy forms within it and begins to move upward and outward. 

Back inside the Oblivion, various devices travel over Chaostaurs body 
and begin to make any necessary repairs as the Mysterious infecticon 
approaches the Medical bay. In the same room as Chaostaur is 
blackknightmare. Inside there is no visible door only black walls 
that have a slight glow to them.
